name: Dr. Arif Alvi
tagline: President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan
content:
PART I]     THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., APRIL   8,  201 8 359 
 
 
 
 
ISLAMABAD,  TUESDAY , JULY   2,  2019 
 
 
PART I  
 
Acts, Ordinances, President’s Orders and Regulations  
 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKIST AN 
 
MINISTRY OF LAW AND JUSTICE  
 
Islamabad, the 1st July, 201 9 
 
  No. F.2(1)/201 9-Pub.—The following Ordinance promulgated by the 
President on 1st July, 2019 is hereby published for general information: — 
 
ORDINANCE  NO. V OF 2019 
AN 
ORDINANCE  
          
to amend the Assets Declaration Act, 2019  
 
 WHEREAS  it is expedient to amend the Assets Declaration Act, 2019 for 
the purposes hereinaf ter appearing;  
 
 AND WHEREAS  the Senate and the National Assembly are not in session 
and the President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan is satisfied that 
circumstances exist which render it nec essary to take immediate action;  
 
(359) 
 
Price: Rs. 5.00 
 
[987(2019)/Ex. Gaz.].   
360 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., JULY   2,  201 9 [PART I 
 
  NOW, THEREFORE , in excercise of the powers conferred by clause (1) of 
Article 89 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President 
of Islamic Republic of Pakistan is pleased to make and promulgate the following 
Ordinance :— 
 
 1. Short title and commencement. —(1) This Ordinance shall be 
called the Assets Declaration (Amendment) Ordinance, 2019.  
 
 (2) It shall come into force at once.  
 
 2. Amendments of section 3 of the Assets Declaration Act, 2019. —
In the Assets Decla ration Act, 2019, hereinafter referred to as the said Act, in 
section 3, for the expression “30th June, 2019”, the expression “3rd July, 2019” 
shall be substituted.  
 
 3. Amendment of section 6 of the Assets Declaration Act, 2019. —
In the said Act, in sectio n 6, in sub -section (1), for the expression “30th June, 
2019”, the expression “3rd July, 2019” shall be substituted.  
 
 4. Amendment of section 8 of the Assets Declaration Act, 2019. —
In the said Act, in section 8, for the expression “30th June”, where ver oc curring, 
the expression “3rd July” shall be substituted.  
 
 5. Amendment of Schedule of the Assets Declaration Act, 2019. —
In the said Act, in the Schedule, in clause (2), — 
 
 (a) for the expression “30th June”, the expression “3rd July” shall be 
substitute; and 
 
 (b) in the Table, in Column (1), against Serial No. 1, in Column (2), for 
the expression “30th June”, the expression “3rd July” shall be 
substituted.  
 
 
 
DR. ARIF ALVI , 
President . 
————  
 
ARSHAD FAROOQ FAHEEM,  
Acting Secretary.  
 
 
——————————————————————— —————————  
PRINTED  BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CORPORATION OF  PAKISTAN PRESS,  ISLAMABAD .  
PUBLISHED BY THE  DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD , KARACHI .
